name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to gain unauthorized access to sensitive information.

action--d2105b84-57ee-4f54-aa5b-f31e8166.description: Terminate any processes running the malicious script.

parallel--3d89c5a3-59d5-4e97-835a-ab7264.name: Initiate Mitigation Steps
parallel--3d89c5a3-59d5-4e97-835a-ab7264.description: Start multiple actions to mitigate the incident.

action--793c0a59-618f-4575-a4c5-da52ec7f.description: Run a malware scan across the network and quarantine threats.

while-condition--5c57a8fd-704e-42e5-a43d.description: Repeat malware scan until the system is clean.
